channel.title: RHBill on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in RHBill on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Aantayin ko ba matapos itong congress voting? Dapat holiday bukas napuyat mga pilipino #rhbill

[01:01] Everytime I’m asked my opinion on something, I’m going to reply “may I be allowed to explain my vote” #rhbill

[01:07] The #rhbill is a defensive measure to minimise addl poverty not to reduce existing poverty. Both kinds of measures are important

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
3mins x 200 congressmen = 10 hours @_@ #RHBill

[22:43] Sana may magsabing “i vote yes because i am wearing purple” #rhbill

[23:52] Ang petiks nung mga congressman, yung isa nglalaro ng angry birds #RHBill
